channel.title: Youtube links are broken?
channel.description:
I was just at the funny picture and video thread, and it appears that none of the youtube links (Without bbc) aren't being formatted into the little video player.
Here are a couple tests (random youtube video)
Tags: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ew_R3bWvna0[/youtube]
No tags:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ew_R3bWvna0
Looks like when we moved to 2.0.7 the code was broken.

item.title: Youtube links are broken?

item.title: Youtube links are broken?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I only had to allow it by clicking the shield once. Since then its worked fine.

edit: who is the girl in the vid :o

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube links are broken?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:5, topic:540594”]It’s in the URL bar if you’re on chrome
Since it became https? I don’t know if mscp has always been or not but yeah it’s annoying[/quote]

http://superuser.com/questions/487748/how-to-allow-chrome-browser-to-load-insecure-content/487824#487824

[quote=“Jmood, post:4, topic:540594”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=659454.msg4410027#msg4410027 date=1393284364]

Look at the right side of your address bar, you will see a shield click it and allow the script to run. Fixed.

Hm. No shield, since when were scripts on here unsafe?
[/quote]

https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/1342714?hl=en[/quote]

https://blog.mozilla.org/tanvi/2013/04/10/mixed-content-blocking-enabled-in-firefox-23/

Read full topic

item.title: Youtube links are broken?

item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:
